title: The most obvious use of a script hack
body: I had a lux zhonyas my Malzahar ult. I would think it's just lux if it didn't happen twice. And this was in ranked. So fair

replies.body: Try vs a Kassadin who can ult every second on level 6 without mana costs. This was Norms not Urf btw. Send in a ticket and guess what happens. Nothing, haven't even heard back. Everyone on team witnessed.
